channel.title: Flash game - New level? (Display text on new level)
channel.description:
Hello.. I've just made a flash game, but it only have 1 level. I know how to create a new level, but I don't know how to display a text like:
[size=12pt][b]LEVEL 2[/b][/size]
Any ideas how I can do that in flash?

item.title: Flash game - New level? (Display text on new level)
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

make a new frame? how else do you plan on implementing a new level unless you use a movieclip in which case create a new frame in that

Read full topic
item.source: Flash game - New level? (Display text on new level)

item.title: Flash game - New level? (Display text on new level)
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

IF LEVEL1:
PRINTLN LEVEL 1
ELSE IF LEVEL2
PRINTLN LEVEL 2

Read full topic
item.source: Flash game - New level? (Display text on new level)

item.title: Flash game - New level? (Display text on new level)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You would do it the same way that you display ‘LEVEL 1’.
